title: National Government Services Portal
description: National Government Services Portal of India provides single window access to services offered by the various Indian Government entities. This Portal is an initiative under the India Portal Project and has been designed and developed by National Informatics Centre (NIC), Ministry of Electronics & Information Technology, Government of India.

items.title: Application for Obtaining Land Ownership Rights on Village Population Land, Madhya Pradesh
items.description: This portal provides an application facility for citizens of Madhya Pradesh to obtain land ownership rights on village population land. Through this service, residents can apply online for recognition of their legal rights over residential plots in rural areas. The system ensures transparency, efficiency, and ease of access by minimizing paperwork and offering digital submission. It supports rural development by securing property rights, reducing disputes, and empowering villagers with official documentation...

items.title: Apply Rural Area Certificate, Punjab
items.description: The Rural Area Certificate is issued to individuals residing outside municipal limits in Punjab. It serves as official proof that the applicant’s residence is in a rural area, not falling under any municipal corporation, committee, or notified zone. This certificate is essential for accessing specific government schemes, admission quotas, and other benefits reserved for rural residents. Applicants can apply online through the official Punjab government portal by submitting necessary documents.

items.title: Apply for Chief Minister Farm-Barn Fire Disaster Relief Scheme, Uttar Pradesh
items.description: Farmers who suffer losses due to barn or farm fires can seek financial assistance under this scheme. Applications must include proof of damage and ownership details.

items.title: Apply for Chief Minister Farmer Disaster Assistance Scheme, Uttar Pradesh
items.description: This scheme provides financial relief to farmers affected by natural disasters like floods, droughts, and hailstorms. Eligible farmers must submit crop loss reports and necessary documents.

items.title: Apply Online DBT Schemes for Farm Implements, Odisha
items.description: The DBT Scheme for Farm Implements in Odisha provides direct subsidies to eligible farmers for purchasing agricultural equipment like tillers, harvesters, and seed drills. Under this scheme, the government transfers a portion of the cost directly to farmers’ bank accounts, promoting mechanization and improving agricultural productivity.

items.title: Apply for Farmer Registry ID, Uttar Pradesh
items.description: Farmers in Uttar Pradesh can register online to get a unique Farmer ID, enabling them to access government schemes, subsidies, and benefits.

items.title: Apply for  Post Cocoon Schemes, Jammu and Kashmir
items.description: Cocoon rearing, a key livelihood in Jammu and Kashmir, is supported through this scheme aimed at empowering women farmers with resources and financial assistance.

items.title: Apply for Farmers Registration of Nursery/ Orchards, Jammu and Kashmir
items.description: Farmers can register nurseries or orchards online in Jammu and Kashmir, paying fees digitally for hassle-free approval.

items.title: Authorisation for Battery Waste Treatment by Pollution Control Board, Goa
items.description: Goa residents can apply for authorization to manage and treat battery waste through the Pollution Control Board. This service promotes environmentally responsible waste disposal practices.

items.title: Authorisation for Construction and Demolition by Pollution Control Board, Goa
items.description: Citizens can apply for authorization for construction and demolition activities through the Pollution Control Board in Goa. This service ensures compliance with environmental regulations during such operations.

items.title: Application for Conversion of land (IPB-Sanad), Goa
items.description: Goa residents can apply for land conversion (Sanad) to change the use of land from agricultural to non-agricultural purposes. This application process is managed online through the state government’s portal, ensuring convenience and transparency.

items.title: Parimarjan Plus- Portal for correction of incorrect entries in the digitized Jamabandi register, Bihar
items.description: Parimarjan Plus enables the correction of errors in digitized Jamabandi records. This user-friendly platform allows property owners to apply for rectifications, ensuring accurate land records in Bihar.

items.title: Land Possession Certificate by Department of Revenue and Land Reforms, Bihar
items.description: The portal provides online access to Land Possession Certificates, ensuring a hassle-free application process. This service validates property ownership and supports legal and financial transactions.

items.title: Door Step Delivery of Revenue Maps by Directorate of Land Records and Survey, Bihar
items.description: The Directorate of Land Records and Survey in Bihar provides doorstep delivery of revenue maps. This initiative saves time and effort, ensuring citizens receive essential land records efficiently.

items.title: Online Conversion of Change in Land Use type by Department of Revenue and Land Reforms, Bihar
items.description: This portal enables online applications for changing the land use type. The streamlined process ensures compliance with regulations while offering convenience to landowners in Bihar.

items.title: e-Mapi by Department of Revenue and Land Reforms, Bihar
items.description: The e-Mapi service by the Bihar government offers access to digitized land maps. This tool is valuable for property verification, planning, and resolving disputes, making land-related information readily accessible to citizens.

items.title: Online Bhu-Lagaan Payment by Department of Revenue and Land Reforms, Bihar
items.description: The Online Bhu-Lagaan Payment system allows citizens to pay land revenue conveniently. This service enhances transparency and reduces the hassle of offline payments by providing a secure and accessible platform.

items.title: Digitally Signed Bhu-Abhilekh by Department of Revenue and Land Reforms, Bihar
items.description: The Bhu-Abhilekh portal by the Department of Revenue and Land Reforms, Bihar, offers digitally signed land records to citizens. This initiative ensures transparency, accessibility, and accuracy in property documentation, supporting the Digital India mission.

items.title: Complete e-KYC for Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi PM-Kisan
items.description: The e-KYC service is essential for verifying the identity of beneficiaries under the PM-Kisan scheme. Farmers can complete their Know Your Customer (KYC) process online, ensuring that they meet the eligibility criteria and receive timely disbursements of the financial aid.

items.title: Check the Status of Your Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi PM-Kisan Application
items.description: This service enables farmers to check the status of their applications for the PM-Kisan scheme. By entering their registration details, applicants can track the progress of their submissions and verify if they have been approved to receive the financial benefits.
